alert.note: Alert for Baker; Northern Columbia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 3:14PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Baker, northeastern Columbia, southeastern Echols, southwestern Brantley, southeastern Ware, southeastern Clinch and northwestern Charlton Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 314 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Stephen Foster State Park, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fargo, Stephen Foster State Park and Race Pond. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
